concept.name: gray [Entity] (SI base absorbed dose unit. It measures the dose of radiation absorbed in living tissue.)

attr.obj: systeme international unit (The class of Systeme International (SI) units.)
unit of absorbed dose (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of absorbed dose measure)
